description: Provides details about an agreement, such as the proposer, acceptor, start date, and end date.

parameters.name: agreementId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the agreement.

nested_items.name: acceptanceTime
nested_items.description: The date and time the offer was accepted or the agreement was created.

nested_items.name: accountId
nested_items.description: The AWS account ID of the acceptor.

nested_items.name: agreementId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier of the agreement.

nested_items.name: agreementType
nested_items.description: The type of agreement. Values are PurchaseAgreement or VendorInsightsAgreement.

nested_items.name: endTime
nested_items.description: The date and time when the agreement ends. The field is null for pay-as-you-go agreements, which don't have end dates.

nested_items.name: estimatedCharges
nested_items.description: The estimated cost of the agreement.

nested_items.name: agreementValue
nested_items.description: The total known amount customer has to pay across the lifecycle of the agreement.

nested_items.name: currencyCode
nested_items.description: Defines the currency code for the charge.

nested_items.name: proposalSummary
nested_items.description: A summary of the proposal received from the proposer.

nested_items.name: offerId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier of the offer in AWS Marketplace.

nested_items.name: resources
nested_items.description: The list of resources involved in the agreement.

nested_items.name: id
nested_items.description: The unique identifier of the resource.

nested_items.name: type
nested_items.description: Type of the resource, which is the product. Values include SaaSProduct or AmiProduct.

nested_items.name: accountId
nested_items.description: The AWS account ID of the proposer.

nested_items.name: startTime
nested_items.description: The date and time when the agreement starts.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The current status of the agreement.
ACTIVE --- The terms of the agreement are active.
ARCHIVED --- The agreement ended without a specified reason.
CANCELLED --- The acceptor ended the agreement before the defined end date.
EXPIRED --- The agreement ended on the defined end date.
RENEWED --- The agreement was renewed into a new agreement (for example, an auto-renewal).
REPLACED --- The agreement was replaced using an agreement replacement offer.

nested_items.type: Only applicable to inactive agreement revisions
nested_items.description: The agreement revision has been rolled back because of an error. An earlier revision is now active.

nested_items.type: Only applicable to inactive agreement revisions
nested_items.description: The agreement revision is no longer active and another agreement revision is now active.
TERMINATED --- The agreement ended before the defined end date because of an AWS termination (for example, a payment failure).
